about_the_game:
Features

  • Traditional Visual Novel where your choices determine your destination.

  • Developed by waffle, the creator of the Funbag Fantasy series!

  • Explore beautifully drawn CGs in full HD resolution!

  • Original or Arranged? Toggle between 2 illustration (color) styles.

Story

Two alchemists, bound together by their ambitious research, dreamt of creating a world where people's hearts could be filled with happiness. After many years, they finally developed the means to do so.

This was the birth of "the homunculus that could survive outside of a flask."

The alchemist’s research paid off, and he celebrated a future where homunculi could enrich the lives of humans as their partners. However, he soon discovered that the friend he trusted had other intentions. He schemed with the king to use their homunculi in war, for which he was richly rewarded and appointed as the royal alchemist.

――Betrayal――

The alchemist confronted his friend.

“Using homunculi in war will reduce human casualties. Expanding our territory is the best chance for prosperity to those living in our kingdom!”

"This is how homunculi can make humanity happy!"

His friend argued back.

――Their bond was a lie.――

The alchemist wept in anger and despair. He went against his friend and pleaded with the king to refuse homunculi from war, but in the end, he was stripped of his position and banished from the royal city for his dissent. Lost in despair, he eventually found himself back in his hometown, which was a remote fishing village. The alchemist took up a quiet life in a house on the outskirts of town, avoiding contact with others.

The years went by.

Despite the rumors of the war's end, the alchemist continued his days like a living corpse, unable to confront the lingering scars on his heart. Until one day, he discovered a "girl" who had been stuffed in bags and dumped in the forest.

content_descriptors.notes:
This title is designed for adult (18+) audiences only. The content of this game may not be suitable for all people. 

This game contains fictional representations of distressful and violent events, including psychological trauma, self-harm, suicide, anti-social behavior, and depression. This game also contains sexual content including body scarring and bruising, nudity, sexual interactions including consensual sex, implied non-consensual sex, oral sex, and clear depictions of genitalia, bodily fluids, and bleeding. All players of this story should be functionally resilient to potential stressors such as depictions of alcohol consumption and crude language. 

This game is designed purely as a work of fiction, please play responsibly.
